summary: Positive vibes web app with daily uplifting quotes; user wants to add upbeat, royalty-free background music and share the live site URL.

existing_features.title: Replace the current single hard-coded background track (/assets/relaxing-music.mp3) with a configurable set of upbeat, positive-vibe royalty-free music tracks served as static frontend assets, and update the player logic to load/play the selected track.

Enhance the existing music controls on MainPage to support upbeat background music playback with: play/pause, volume control, and track selection; ensure all user-facing labels are in English and match an upbeat/positive tone.
Add a small in-app attribution section for the included royalty-free music (e.g., track title + author/source/license text), displayed in the UI (footer or near the music controls).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add upbeat, royalty-free background music to the website (audio player/background music feature)
